label: uncl4279
comment: Code qualifying the type of payment terms.

values.label: Basic
values.comment: Payment conditions normally applied.

values.label: End of month
values.comment: Payments are due at end of month.

values.label: Fixed date
values.comment: Payments are due on the fixed date specified.

values.label: Deferred
values.comment: Payments are deferred beyond the normal due date.

values.label: Discount not applicable
values.comment: Payment terms on which discounts are not applicable.

values.label: Mixed
values.comment: Different payment terms negotiated under a documentary credit.

values.label: Extended
values.comment: Payment is extended beyond the normal due date.

values.label: Basic discount offered
values.comment: Payment terms reflect the basic offered discount.

values.label: Proximo
values.comment: Occurring in the next month after present.

values.label: Instant
values.comment: Payment is due on receipt of invoice.

values.label: Elective
values.comment: Payment terms to be chosen by buyer (from options separately advised).

values.label: 10 days after end of month
values.comment: Payment due ten days after end of a calendar month.

values.label: Seller to advise buyer
values.comment: Seller will advise buyer of payment terms by separate transaction.

values.label: Paid against statement
values.comment: Payments are to be made against statement.

values.label: No charge
values.comment: Payment terms have no charge.

values.label: Not yet defined
values.comment: Payment terms are not yet defined.

values.label: Ultimo
values.comment: Payment is due the end of the current or specified month.

values.label: Previously agreed upon
values.comment: Payment terms have been previously agreed upon.

values.label: United States funds
values.comment: The payment terms require the use of United States funds.

values.label: Penalty terms
values.comment: Payment terms on which penalties apply.

values.label: Payment by instalment
values.comment: Payment terms are based on instalment payments.

values.label: Discount
values.comment: Payment terms on which discounts are applicable.

values.label: Available by sight payment
values.comment: Payment made at sight.

values.label: Available by deferred payment
values.comment: Payment made at deferred date.

values.label: Available by acceptance
values.comment: Payment on acceptance.

values.label: Available by negotiation with any bank
values.comment: Payment made by negotiation with any bank.

values.label: Available by negotiation with any bank in ...
values.comment: Payment made by negotiation with any bank in a specified location.

values.label: Available by negotiation by named bank
values.comment: Payment made by negotiation with a specified financial institution.

values.label: Available by negotiation
values.comment: Payment made by negotiation.

values.label: Adjustment payment
values.comment: Payment adjusted for outstanding credits or debits.

values.label: Late payment
values.comment: Payment after due date.

values.label: Advanced payment
values.comment: Payment in advance of due date.

values.label: Payment by instalments according to progress (as agreed)
values.comment: Payment by instalments according to progress (as agreed).

values.label: Payment by instalments according to progress (to be agreed)
values.comment: Payment by instalments according to progress (to be agreed).

values.label: Nonstandard
values.comment: Terms of payment differ from the normal terms.

values.label: Tenor payment terms
values.comment: Payment to be made according to bilaterally agreed conditions between buyer and seller.

values.label: Complete payment
values.comment: Payment must be made for complete value and may not be paid in instalments.

values.label: Payment terms defined in consolidated invoice
values.comment: Payment terms are specified in a consolidated invoice.

values.label: Payment upon completion
values.comment: The payment terms require payment upon completion.

values.label: Partial advance
values.comment: The payment terms require a partial payment in advance of completion.

values.label: Consignment
values.comment: The payment terms are that the goods will be paid for when they are sold or consumed.

values.label: Inter-company account
values.comment: The payment terms involve the use of an inter-company account.

values.label: Sell by note
values.comment: The payment terms involve a debtor who promises to pay a definite sum of money on demand or at a definite time in the future.

values.label: Supplier floor plan
values.comment: The payment terms involve payment for merchandise owned by a third party.

values.label: Contract basis
values.comment: The payment terms are based on a contract with a vendor.

values.label: Credit controlled
values.comment: The payment terms involve the monitoring of credit by the grantor.

values.label: Dating given
values.comment: The payment terms in which suppliers may extend seasonal dating.

values.label: Trade acceptance
values.comment: A trade acceptance is a written acknowledgement of the sale of goods and promise to pay at a definite date and place.

values.label: Cost plus
values.comment: The payment terms permit reimbursement of costs plus other authorised changes.

values.label: Letter of credit
values.comment: The payment terms require the use of a letter of credit.

values.label: Lease agreement
values.comment: The payment terms are included in the lease agreement.

values.label: Cash On Delivery (COD)
values.comment: The payment terms are cash is due on delivery of merchandise.

values.label: Cash by state law
values.comment: The payment terms are dictated by state law requiring payment of cash.

values.label: Bank transfer
values.comment: The payment terms require the use of bank transfer.

values.label: Cash on arrival
values.comment: The payment terms require payment by cash on arrival of the goods or services.

values.label: Cash
values.comment: The payment terms are that payments are made in cash.

values.label: Cash discount terms apply
values.comment: The payment terms are that a discount is applicable if the payment is made in cash.

values.label: Cash with order
values.comment: The payment terms require the payment in cash with placement of the order.

values.label: Cash per vendor request
values.comment: The payment terms involve a vendor request for payment by cash.

values.label: Irrevocable letter of credit
values.comment: The payment terms require the use of an irrevocable letter of credit.

values.label: Documents against acceptance
values.comment: The payment terms require acceptance of liability before document transfer.

values.label: Charge card
values.comment: The payment terms permit the use of a charge card to effect payment.

values.label: Documents against payment
values.comment: The payment terms require payment before document transfer.

values.label: Usance bill
values.comment: The payment terms are based on the time allowed by commercial usage for the payment of foreign bills of exchange.

values.label: Letter of credit at sight
values.comment: The payment terms require the presentation of a letter of credit.

values.label: Secured account
values.comment: The payment terms call for the use of a secured account.

values.label: Basic commission terms
values.comment: The payment terms call for the use of basic commission terms.

values.label: Deposit required
values.comment: The payment terms require a deposit be provided.

values.label: Discount with prompt pay
values.comment: The payment terms include a discount when payment is made within a time frame designated as prompt pay.

values.label: Discount with advance payment
values.comment: The payment terms include a discount when payment is made in advance.

values.label: Certified cheque
values.comment: The payment terms require the use of a certified cheque.

values.label: Cash against documents
values.comment: The payment terms require cash payment before document transfer.

values.label: Bill of exchange
values.comment: The payment terms require the use of bill of exchange.

values.label: Progressive discount
values.comment: The payment terms include a progressive discount based on the amount and speed with which payments are made.

values.label: Lump sum
values.comment: The payment term requires a lump sum payment.

values.label: Fixed fee
values.comment: The payment term requires a fixed fee payment.

values.label: Promissory note
values.comment: The payment term requires the use of a promissory note as a means of payment.

values.label: Factoring
values.comment: Payment term requires payment being made by the factoring company according to the agreement between buyer, bank and factoring company.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code list.
